attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2003-0078

Date: 2003-01-30

                  Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Minister of Natural Resources, pursuant to subsection 21(2) of the National Energy Board Act, hereby approves the issuance by the National Energy Board to Aquila Networks Canada (British Columbia) Ltd. of amending Orders AO-2-EC-40 and AO-3-EC-41, copies of which are attached hereto.


                  Sur recommandation du ministre des Ressources naturelles et en vertu du paragraphe 21(2) de la Loi sur l’Office national de l’énergie, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil agrée que l’Office national de l’énergie délivre à Aquila Networks Canada (British Columbia) Ltd. les ordonnances modificatrices AO-2-EC-40 et AO-3-EC-41, dont copies sont jointes.
attachmentText: PC Number: 2003-0078Date: 2003-01-30                     Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,  on the recommendation of the Minister of Natural Resources, pursuant to subsection 21(2) of the National Energy Board Act, hereby approves the issuance by the National Energy Board to Aquila Networks Canada (British Columbia) Ltd. of amending Orders AO-2-EC-40 and AO-3-EC-41, copies of which are attached  hereto.                    Sur recommandation du ministre des Ressources naturelles et en vertu du paragraphe 21(2) de la Loi sur l’Office national de l’énergie, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil agrée que l’Office national de l’énergie délivre à Aquila Networks Canada (British Columbia) Ltd. les ordonnances modificatrices AO-2-EC-40 et AO-3-EC-41, dont copies sont jointes.
